name: Xenolasso (jam submission)
description:
You're alone on a planet. Aliens surround you.

And they're adorable!

Run around the critters to get them stuck in your lasso. You can sell them for upgrades or hold onto them for "research." Either way, your boss isn't letting you blast off for home until you've found them all.

This 2D puzzle sidescroller was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47, theme: Stuck in a loop. All art, music, and non-code assets were created from scratch by our team of seven. 

This game is known to lag in web browsers on slower computers. Our apologies!

The bugfix version fixes code errors that prevented the player from accessing multiple endings or listening to all the music our compose wrote! Access the bugfix version here.
